name: Tingles
description:
Tingles 8m male with Saba 1y male
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Saba and Tingles are the dynamic duo of the next generation! Saba is the nonchalant aloof one but does enjoy a nap with his buddy Tingles. Tingles is all about the lovin', sometimes even a bit too much for Tingles. Like any pair of siblings, a playful hussle and tussle is usual, which is why they will need a large indoor and outdoor space (once the time is right)

name: Mishka
description:
Mishka 2y female
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Meet Mishka!Sweet Mishka would like a quiet home where she can truly blossom. She's no stranger to a lap cuddle and is growing in confidence and curiosity here in the cattery. She has previously lived with other cats but seems to prefer the company of humans, so we ask that she be the only pet. Mishka needs a private garden space for when she is ready to explore outdoors as she h

name: Phoebe
description:
Phoebe 1y female
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Sweet Phoebe will melt your heart with her cute face and little meow.She loves her play tunnel and also to jump on your lap and make biscuits whilst looking out of the window of her pen to see whats going on! She has never been outside before but as she is still young we will only accept applications from a home with a safe enclosed garden for her to explore when she is ready. Ph

name: Zoya
description:
Zoya 6 year old female
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            If you're looking for an independent feline friend, then look the other way! This sweet white fluffball is the perfect lap-loving companion who thrives off cuddles and attention. She would be best suited to a pet-free home where she can be the star of the show. When Zoya is comfortable, you'll find it hard to keep her away from your lap, so please only enquire if you're abl

name: Galaxy
description:
Galaxy 7 year old male
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Meet our gorgeous shining star Galaxy.This chunky lad can be a little shy at first, but beneath that gentle reserve is a friendly, sweet-natured boy with his own unique, cosmic charm.He would thrive in a home where he is allowed to be independent and not pestered to be a lap cat. With patience and kindness, he quickly shows his affectionate side showing he would make a love

name: Leo
description:
Leo  1 year old male INDOOR ONLY
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Lovely Leo is a super affectionate lad, always happy to warm up your lap and give a few head bumps. Unfortunately he has tested positive for FIV (Feline Immunodeficiency Virus) and whereas he is super healthy in himself if he goes outside he is more likely to pick up nasty bugs that he will then take longer to recover from. name: Mr Green
description:
Mr Green 1year old male
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Oh Mr Green! Such a sweet boy with the cutest pointy face and most endearing expression.He has come from a multi-cat household and will be keen to find a home where he isn't constantly watching his back and getting his lunch-money stolen.He'll happily stick his nose from under cover for a few biscuits and is gradually becoming a lap limpet for the chosen few. name: Maggie
description:
Maggie 8y female
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Miss Maggie went to stay with one of our brilliant foster carers when she came to us and they had this to say about her "This beautiful tabby was initially quite worried and spent much of her first days in her foster home hiding. She made it very clear she preferred to be left alone. How different things are now! She jumps down to meet us when we come to say hello and enjoys a fu

name: Janet
description:
2 years old / female / indoor
Meet Janet, a calm, elegant black beauty with the most soulful eyes and a whole lot of personality.

​

A true lady of leisure, Janet’s perfect day involves lounging on the biggest bed in the house, stretching out on the sofa, or spending an afternoon at the window watching the world go by.

​

She’s grown to love gentle snuggles, daytime sofa cuddles, and will happily come to you for chin scratches and head rubs. She adores sitting close by and will reward you with

name: Big daddy
description:
2 years old / male / indoor
This sweet boy has truly blossomed in his foster home. He began a little shy and skittish, but with patience and love he’s revealed his gentle, affectionate soul. Now he’s a friendly little shadow who happily greets you when you come home and enjoys being part of your everyday routine.

​

He’s wonderfully well-mannered — never naughty or messy — with absolutely perfect litter habits. He loves his scratching post, goes wild for treats, and adores his catnip toys. Whil

name: Rush
description:
5 years old / female / indoor
Rush is a very affectionate girl who loves being close to her people. She’ll happily cuddle up beside you in bed, on the couch, and sometimes even follow you into the bathroom just to keep you company. Her purrs have a magical quality, and before you know it you may find yourself opening another packet of Dreamies just for her.

​

She can be a little timid at first, but with gentle reassurance she quickly learns to trust and relax. Once she does, her loving nature

name: Teddy
description: 2 years old / male / indoor

name: Oliver
description:
OLIVER2 years old / male / indoor Oliver is a very sweet boy with so much love to give. He came in as a street cat and was extremely wary of human interaction at first, spending his first couple of months keeping his distance. With patience (and a few tasty treats to tempt him out of hiding), he slowly gained confidence and began keeping his foster carer company — especially during TV time.

​

At first, Oliver was very quiet, but he’s found his voice and will now happily have a chat, particular

name: Nugget
description:
nUGGET1 year old / female / indoor Nugget is a sweet little angel with a soft, thoughtful personality. She can be a bit cautious at first, preferring to observe from a respectful distance, but once she feels safe she’ll happily follow you around the house and settle nearby, keeping you company in her own calm, loving way.

​

She’s not a fan of being picked up, but she more than makes up for it with affection on her own terms. Nugget adores head and chin scratches and will greet you in the morni

name:
Lisette
(assigned to adopter)
description:
2 years old / female / indoor
Lisette — or Zetty or Zet for short — is a very sweet, well-behaved, intelligent, and playful little cat. Playfulness is definitely her buzzword right now, as she’s really growing into that side of her personality. She loves chasing and pouncing on toys, and hiding in her tunnel before jumping out for a surprise attack.

​

She’s a cat who enjoys her routine, especially when it comes to mealtimes, but she’s also very considerate in the mornings. If breakfast is runn

name: Ross
description:
Ross3 years old / male / indoor / FIV+Meet Ross – a handsome boy with an unforgettable moustache and a serious love of food! 

​

If Ross isn’t meowing for his next meal, he’s definitely thinking about it. Food aside, he’s a confident, friendly cat who absolutely adores meeting new people.

​

Ross settles into new environments quickly and will reward you almost instantly with loud purrs and enthusiastic chin scratches. He’s relaxed, social, and enjoys being part of the action.

​

While Ross ha

name: Holly & sasha
description:
Holly & Sasha7 & 10 years old / females / indoor

(assigned to adopter)Meet Holly and Sasha:

​​

Double the fluff, double the love!

​​

Holly is our social butterfly — always curious, affectionate, and eager to be part of whatever you’re doing. She’ll follow you around the house, charm your guests, and happily snuggle up for belly rubs and bedtime cuddles. Expect plenty of purrs and head bumps!

​​

Sasha is the quieter sister — a gentle soul who takes her time to build trust, but once she doe

name: Joe, nick and kevin
description:
4 months old / males / indoor
Meet the boy band of your dreams — Joe, Nick and Kevin 

Joe is the long-haired charmer and lead vocalist of the group. He loves to be part of the action - whether that’s playing with his toys or hanging out with his humans - and when he’s all tuckered out will relax on his back with his paws in the air. Joe is the first to say hello in the morning or greet you at the front door and loves being petted. With Joe you can expect the softest headbutts and sofa snuggles!

name: Minsk & kiev
description:
Minsk & Kiev4 months old / male & female / indoor

(assigned to adopter)Meet Minsk & Kiev
These adorable siblings are searching for a forever home together.

Minsk is the perfect blend of independent and affectionate. She’s happy entertaining herself for hours, chasing toys and exploring with endless curiosity. When playtime winds down, she transforms into the sweetest cuddle companion. Minsk loves quiet one-on-one time with her humans and happily soaks up gentle pets, cozy snuggles, and naps cu

name: Talin
description:
Talin3 months old / female / indoor

(assigned to adopter)Talin is a sweet girl wrapped in the softest little ball of fluff.

She’s affectionate and gentle, melting in your arms and happiest when enjoying pets and cuddles, but she also has an independent personality and can entertain herself when needed.

Talin isn’t just looking for loving humans — she’s also looking for a patient more experienced companion cat to share her adventures and cozy moments with.

If you’re dreaming of a loyal, lovin

name: Squirt & kilo
description:
1 year old / male & female / indoor
Meet Squirt (the dashing mostly-black boy) and Kilo (the beautiful half-and-half queen) — two unlikely best friends who found each other in their foster home.

​

They were rescued separately but bonded instantly — total opposites attract energy!​

 

Squirt is the affectionate extrovert: loves feather wands, lap time, and exploring every corner. He’s a little foodie with a sensitive tummy, so he needs someone who can keep an eye on his diet.​

 

Kilo is the

name: ​banksy & micah
description:
​Banksy & Micah2 years & 6 months old / males / indoor Meet Banksy and Micah!


This lowkey duo have become inseparable while in foster care together.

Banksy (black & white) is a very mellow, easy going boy who enjoys playing with little Micah. He likes to sleep in a sunny spot, be pet, and sometimes held. He has helped bring Micah out of his shell and become more confident.

Micah (white & tabby) is a bit shy at first with humans, taking some time to settle in. However, with some food and his

name: Genta
description:
11 years old / female / indoor
Genta is a gorgeous senior girl with a strong personality!

She loves to play, lounge around in the sun, keep a lookout at the window, and curl up to sleep next to you or in her bed.

She appreciates her own space and will let you know when she wants it - she might sit next to you on the sofa but will gently let you know to leave her alone if you pet her - She is though very sweet and loves head and chin scratches in her own terms.

She’s very food motivated- both

name: Poofy and Smokey
description:
Poofy and Smokey 9m female
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Pretty Poofy and Sweet Smokey and are a bonded pair that will melt your heart with their cute friendly personalities. Once they’re settled they will need a safe enclosed garden to explore and play. Poofy and Smokey will be ready to go to her new home from Saturday.

description:
Spicer  2y old male
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Meet handsome Spicer, you will certainly find no cat nicer!He came in as a stray, but that was back in the day.Now he wants to live the socialised way.Spicer came in covered in scabs and was initially a little bit frantic but as soon as he was given a few soft furnishings and toys it was like something clicked and he remembered life before his time on the streets. name: Bowser
description:
Bowser 2 year old male
                        South London Cat Centre
                        
                            Despite his scary big boy name, Bowser is the gentlest boy ever! After a few cautious steps from under his hiding space and a quick wide eyed check of who's entered his home, Bowser will welcome you with the sweetest head bump and a roll onto his back.
